long_description: Comfort and versatility is the name of the game with the 6-person, 3-season Kelty Mach 6 tent. Highlights include Inflatable air poles, an integrated rainfly, a large vestibule and 2 sleep rooms. Inflatable air poles, with easy-access points, allow tent to be inflated and deflated in about a minute; includes a high-volume, dual-action floor pump. Inflatable air poles resist bending, breaking and kinking, and keep the Mach 6 standing tall and ready to go in even in stormy weather. Integrated, fully vented rainfly further simplifies setup. Dine and relax in the large central vestibule; mesh window and door panel zips closed for weather protection and privacy. Double-zipper door opens wide for easy access. Versatile with abundant comfort; 1 or both of the fully enclosed sleep-room inserts can be removed to create 1 cavernous area to store gear or hang out in bad weather. Each sleep room offers 49 sq. ft. of floor space; centrally located vestibule offers 38 sq. ft. of storage and a peak height of 6 ft. 4 in. for abundant head room. Fully stake out tent and guyout points, including side vents, to stabilize tent and maximize ventilation; guylines live in their own storage pockets for quick access. UV-resistant polyester rainfly will not stretch when wet, ensuring a consistently taut pitch. Seam-taped rainfly and floor ensure watertight protection. Noiseless zipper pulls and internal storage pockets enhance your comfort while in the Kelty Mach 6 tent.
short_description: Comfort and versatility is the name of the game with the 6-person, 3-season Kelty Mach 6 tent. Highlights include Inflatable air poles, an integrated rainfly, a large vestibule and 2 sleep rooms.
